{
  "description": "Created by Automation reusable workflow",
  "title": "$activity.definition_activity_028XITD8YKVKA007gvWYXDsTUpX82CKquF3.output.variable_workflow_027MPY3J7N87V0Um28EpVEQYd7vQzDaaqJW$",
  "name": "$activity.definition_activity_028XITD8YKVKA007gvWYXDsTUpX82CKquF3.output.variable_workflow_027MPY3J7N87V0Um28EpVEQYd7vQzDaaqJW$",
  "rule_type": "rule_event",
  "properties": {
    $workflow.definition_workflow_028XF9K6AETHA6VC2WkWv7lZryz7Zs0AUx2.local.variable_workflow_028XIUJ5Q9OWY5Z66Vv1hAPD8eff2kf5zmZ$
    "description": "Created by Automation reusable workflow",
    "disabled": false,
    "display_name": "$activity.definition_activity_028XITD8YKVKA007gvWYXDsTUpX82CKquF3.output.variable_workflow_027MPY3J7N87V0Um28EpVEQYd7vQzDaaqJW$",
    "group_by": true,
    "rule_type": "rule_event",
    "title": "$activity.definition_activity_028XITD8YKVKA007gvWYXDsTUpX82CKquF3.output.variable_workflow_027MPY3J7N87V0Um28EpVEQYd7vQzDaaqJW$",
    "workflows_config": [
      {
        "disabled": false,
        "workflow_id": "$activity.definition_activity_028XFG1AOOLOO5Kt4Ls6tat3d49gO7ngrZy.output.variable_workflow_026YHD0WACZ1F1xGmmAahjuT0jcvHs0UQav$",
        "wf_input_variables": {
          "$activity.definition_activity_028XFTN4F6X027ACa8ySAGt6lslKJvMs0VJ.output.jsonpath_queries.parent_String_Var$": "$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.incident.confidence$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.incident.description$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.incident.id$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.incident.incident_time.opened$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.incident.scores.asset$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.incident.scores.global$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.incident.scores.ttp$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.incident.severity$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.incident.short_description$]
[$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.incident.source$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.incident.status$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.incident.tactics[0]$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.incident.tactics[-1]$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.incident.techniques[0]$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.incident.techniques[-1]$]
[$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.incident.timestamp$]
[$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.incident.title$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.incident.tlp$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.firstEventDate$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.lastEventDate$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.observables.data[0].type$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.observables.data[0].value$]
[$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.observables.totalCount$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.severity.data[0].count$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.severity.data[0].value$]
[$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.severity.totalCount$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.source.data[0].count$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.source.data[0].value$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.source.totalCount$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.targets.data[-1].count$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.targets.data[-1].observableType$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.targets.data[-1].type$
$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.targets.data[-1].value$",
          "$activity.definition_activity_028XFTN4F6X027ACa8ySAGt6lslKJvMs0VJ.output.jsonpath_queries.parent_INT_Var$": "$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.eventsCount$",
          "$activity.definition_activity_028XFTN4F6X027ACa8ySAGt6lslKJvMs0VJ.output.jsonpath_queries.parent_Decimal_Var$": "$rule.$activity.definition_activity_028XIQ6GI8LZF5VoHZgWSOlFyNbJZnIGs5V.output.jsonpath_queries.Schema_ID_Inc_Rule$.output.incident.scores.global$",
          "$activity.definition_activity_028XFTN4F6X027ACa8ySAGt6lslKJvMs0VJ.output.jsonpath_queries.parent_Bool_Var$": true
        }
      }
    ],
    "stop_subsequent_rules": true
  },
  "id": "$activity.definition_activity_028XITD8YKVKA007gvWYXDsTUpX82CKquF3.output.variable_workflow_027MPXU910JZU3Qf8DD47CpW5iirIAtYRT0$"
}

properties.name: Header Accept (Optional)
properties.description: The Accept request HTTP header indicates which content types, expressed as MIME types, the client is able to understand. The server uses content negotiation to select one of the proposals and informs the client of the choice with the Content-Type response header.

properties.name: Provide Token to run a workflow
properties.description: Provide a Token to Execute the workflow

properties.name: Headers Cookie (Not Mandatory)
properties.description:
An HTTP cookie (web cookie, browser cookie) is a small piece of data that a server sends to a user's web browser. The browser may store the cookie and send it back to the same server with later requests. Typically, an HTTP cookie is used to tell if two requests come from the same browserkeeping a user logged in, for example. It remembers stateful information for the stateless HTTP protocol.

Cookies are mainly used for three purposes:

Session management
Logins, shopping carts, game scores, or anything else the server should remember

Personalization
User preferences, themes, and other settings

Tracking
Recording and analyzing user behavior

properties.name: Select Method (EX: GET, PUT, POST, DELETE)
properties.description: The primary or most commonly-used HTTP methods are POST, GET, PUT, PATCH, and DELETE. These methods correspond to create, read, update, and delete (or CRUD) operations, respectively. There are a number of other methods, too, but they are utilized less frequently.

properties.name: Header User-Agent (optional)
properties.description: The User-Agent request header is a characteristic string that lets servers and network peers identify the application, operating system, vendor, and/or version of the requesting user agent

properties.name: Provide Request Body if needed (Ex: Create targets, wf's)
Value (Only For Tenant creation) Provide Tenant id
